text:
This lesson features an iconic and
hilarious scene from Friends

where we learn about
Ross and Rachel's bedroom fantasies.

Obviously, this may be offensive
to some viewers and if you are easily offended

then I would recommend you check out
all of our family-friendly lessons
in this playlist instead.

Otherwise, get ready to laugh and learn
a ton with this lesson from Friends.
Hey! Are you a Friends fan?

Well, with our Fluent with Friends course
you will learn English with the full episodes
of the first two seasons of Friends.
And you can try it for FREE right now,

with our 3-Part Mini-course.
Just click up at the top,

or down the description below to
learn more and sign up!
And if you do, I hope you really enjoy it.
So, here at Learning English with TV Series,

every single week we help learners
like you understand fast-speaking natives
WITHOUT getting lost,
WITHOUT missing the jokes,
and WITHOUT subtitles!

Take Cafer for example, who says that he
has improved his English

and increased his vocabulary in three months
that he's been studying with us.

And you can too â€”
You just have to hit that Subscribe button,
and the bell down below,
so you don't miss any of our new lessons.
Hey! Are you a Star Wars fan like Ross is?

Well, we actually have a lesson
teaching English with Star Wars

that you can check out after you
finish this lesson.

All right! Awesome job! I hope you
learned a lot, and had a lot of fun.
But, don't stop the learning now!
Check out all of our lessons with Friends
in this playlist.
And be sure to check out that FREE 3-part Mini-course
so you can take your learning
to the next level right now.
And now, it's time to go beyond the classroom,
and LIVE your English!
Aww yeah!
